product_name: Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole trekking poles for women combine a revolutionary folding design with FlickLock Pro adjustability, offering support for backpacking and stream crossings. Innovative folding Z-Pole system offers simple, compact and reliable support with a concealed inner cord, single push-button release and speed cone deployment. Inspired by snow probes, speed cones at the end of each pole section ensure strength, stability and superfast deployment; each speed cone guides a pole section into place. Quick pull on the grip and the first pole section snaps and locks the 3 pole sections into place; flexible tube ends protect the Kevlar(R) center cord when folded. FlickLock Pro is 20% smaller and 30% easier to open than its predecessor and offers twice the holding force. Easily replace and solidly secure pole tips with WaveLock(TM) tip connections. Right- and left-hand-specific straps are light, breathable and moisture-wicking; they feature breathable cut-out windows and easy rip-and-stick adjustability. Light, non-slip EVA foam grips feature foam extensions that allow poles to be held lower on the shaft, a convenience for your short side during hill traverses. Single FlickLock(R) mechanism near the grip of each pole offers 8 in. of adjustable length. Aluminum shafts are superlight and durable. Pole baskets feature shaft catchers to secure pole sections when folded. Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole trekking poles come with interchangeable, nonmarking rubber tips, carbide tips and a stow bag. Note: these three-season poles feature fixed baskets.
short_description: The Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole trekking poles for women combine a revolutionary folding design with FlickLock Pro adjustability, offering support for backpacking and stream crossings.
